about.description:
The external filter mechanism introduced with HDF5 1.8.12 allows
applications to utilize custom filters not shipped by the HDF5
core library without recompiling your application. This package
provides external filters for HDF5 for the Bitshuffle, BZIP2,
and LZ4 compression algorithms.
about.summary:
Provides dynamically loadable compression filters for HDF5 that are
popular for photon or neutron science

name: hdf5-external-filter-plugins-bzip2
raw_recipe:

    version: 0.1.0

        - libssh2 1.9.0 hab1572f_5
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 hdf63c60_16
        - libuv 1.40.0 h516909a_0
        - make 4.3 h516909a_0
        - markupsafe 1.1.1 py38h1e0a361_1
        - ncurses 6.2 he1b5a44_1
        - openssl 1.1.1h h516909a_0

        - readline 8.0 he28a2e2_2
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - setuptools 49.6.0 py38h32f6830_1
        - six 1.15.0 pyh9f0ad1d_0

    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_gnu
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h516909a_3
        - hdf5 1.10.6 nompi_h3c11f04_101
        - libgcc-ng 9.3.0 h24d8f2e_16
        - libgfortran-ng 7.5.0 hdf63c60_16
        - libgomp 9.3.0 h24d8f2e_16
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.3.0 hdf63c60_16
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1009
    run:
        - bzip2 >=1.0.8,<2.0a0

        - hdf5 >=1.10.6,<1.10.7.0a0
        - libgcc-ng >=7.5.0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=7.5.0
test:
    commands:
        - conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX hdf5-external-filter-plugins-bzip2
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/plugins/libh5bz2.so
about:
    description: 'The external filter mechanism introduced with HDF5 1.8.12 allows

        applications to utilize custom filters not shipped by the HDF5

        core library without recompiling your application. This package

        provides external filters for HDF5 for the Bitshuffle, BZIP2,

        and LZ4 compression algorithms.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/nexusformat/HDF5-External-Filter-Plugins
    doc_url: https://github.com/nexusformat/HDF5-External-Filter-Plugins
    home: https://github.com/nexusformat/HDF5-External-Filter-Plugins
    license: MIT AND LicenseRef-HDF5 AND BSD-3-Clause
    license_family: OTHER
    license_file:
        - licenses/bitshuffle.txt
        - licenses/bzip2-additional-legal.txt
        - licenses/bzip2.txt
        - licenses/lz4-h5py-Copyrights-and-Licenses.txt
        - licenses/lz4.txt
    summary: 'Provides dynamically loadable compression filters for HDF5 that are

        popular for photon or neutron science

        '
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - Anthchirp
